mapper.select: SELECT hour, SUM(pv) as pv FROM t_link_access_stats where full_short_url = #{fullShortUrl} AND del_flag = '0' AND date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY hour

SELECT hour, SUM(pv) as pv FROM t_link_access_stats t1, t_link t2 where gid = #{gid} AND t1.full_short_url = t2.full_short_url AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY hour
select weekday, sum(pv) AS count FROM t_link_access_stats WHERE full_short_url = #{fullShortUrl} AND del_flag = 0 AND date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY weekday

select weekday, sum(pv) AS count FROM t_link_access_stats t1, t_link t2 WHERE gid = #{gid} AND t1.full_short_url = t2.full_short_url AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY weekday
